data.title: Private Equity
data.meta_description: Lawyers across the firm collaborate seamlessly to advise on transactions and matters across the entire private equity life cycle.
data.text:
In serving the private equity sector, few firms can match our combination of technical capabilities, market knowledge, vigorous client coverage and support for our sponsor clientsâ€™ legal, regulatory and risk needs.

We advise a diverse group of private equity firms; large sponsors affiliated with financial institutions; sovereign wealth funds; leading LP, secondary and growth equity investors; and venture capital firms.

Our clients trust our deep experience in areas including fund formation and regulatory issues; leveraged buyouts and equity investments of all types; bridge, high-yield, bank debt, asset-based and direct lending financings for portfolio companies; tax planning and structuring; management compensation programs; follow-on investments; IPOs, equity offerings, margin loans and derivative instruments; and recapitalizations and workouts.
